statements: DELETE FROM injuries WHERE player_id = 101 AND injury_type = 'Fracture';
DELETE FROM injuries WHERE recovery_progress < 50 AND medical_history LIKE '%surgery%';
DELETE FROM Players WHERE player_id = 100 AND team_id = 1;
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE recovery_progress = 'In Progress' AND injury_type = 'Knee Injury';
DELETE FROM injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Sprain' AND recovery_status = 'Ongoing';
DELETE FROM medical_history WHERE player_id = 101 AND visit_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM injuries WHERE recovery_status = 'Complete' AND injury_type = 'Sprain';
DELETE FROM Injuries WHERE injury_id = 100 AND injury_type = 'Sprain';
DELETE FROM injuries WHERE injury_type = 'ACL Tear' AND injury_status = 'Active';
